instructions.da: Drej skarpt til højre videre ad Cool highway
instructions.de: Scharf rechts weiterfahren auf Cool highway
instructions.en: Make a sharp right to stay on Cool highway
instructions.eo: Turniĝu ege dekstren al Cool highway
instructions.es: Gira a la derecha en Cool highway
instructions.es-ES: Gire a la derecha en Cool highway
instructions.fi: Jatka jyrkästi oikeaan pysyäksesi tiellä Cool highway
instructions.fr: Braquer à droite pour rester sur Cool highway
instructions.he: פנה בחדות ימינה כדי להישאר על Cool highway
instructions.id: Make a sharp right to stay on Cool highway
instructions.it: Fau una stretta curva a destra per stare su Cool highway
instructions.nl: Sla scherp rechts af om op Cool highway te blijven
instructions.pl: Skręć w prawo w ostry zakręt, aby pozostać na Cool highway
instructions.pt-BR: Faça uma curva fechada a direita para manter-se na Cool highway
instructions.pt-PT: Vire acentuadamente à direita para se manter em Cool highway
instructions.ro: Virați puternic la dreapta pe Cool highway
instructions.ru: Резко поверните направо на Cool highway
instructions.sv: Sväng höger och fortsätt på Cool highway
instructions.tr: Cool highway üzerinde kalmak için sağa keskin dönüş yap
instructions.uk: Поверніть різко праворуч щоб залишитись на Cool highway
instructions.vi: Quẹo gắt bên phải để chạy tiếp trên Cool highway
instructions.zh-Hans: Make a sharp right to stay on Cool highway
